instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281-A not drawing 20v no ppbus_G3H
threads.message:
U3100 is getting warmer, drawing 5v
I replace it. 
all the 4ports are drawing 5v, ammeter is restarting after 3 sec on all ports now 
No PPBUS_G3H
PP3V3_G3H is present
PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOS IS present 
PP3V3_UPC_XA_LDO IS present. 
have also replace u7000 
Have checked all resistor around u7000

threads.title: 820-00281-A not drawing 20v no ppbus_G3H
threads.message: Check for short on all big coils.

threads.title: 820-00281-A not drawing 20v no ppbus_G3H
threads.message: No short on the big coils

threads.title: 820-00281-A not drawing 20v no ppbus_G3H
threads.message: I reballed   the cd3251 again u3100 and it worked. Thanks 😅😅😅😅

threads.title: 820-00281-A not drawing 20v no ppbus_G3H
threads.message: The MB is not booting up, it’s drawing 20v, the current goes to 0.00 after 2 sec, the MB displays low battery, I tried to disconnect the battery from the motherboard, still shows the low battery sign.
